reviews.review: I hate this game more than anything in the world. The ranking system is terrible and the community is toxic, but I honestly cannot stop playing it no matter how hard I try.
Jogo ruim, mas bom, mas ruim muit ruim, mas muito divertido, mas muito estressante, mas legal
Muito Bom, Um Pouquinho Antigo Mais Muito Massa!
good game when you get the learning curve, some toxic players tho
its fun but can have issues
se bardea pero se caga de risa ndeah
Tirando os usuários do veneno, o jogo é mto bom !
Çok fazla hile var aq oyununda
dps de um tempo e chato mas e legal
Pretty much the Standard for PC Competitive FPS gaming. If you are on PC and want that experience, this is the game that will give it to you over many of the others out there.
Если не учитывать читеров в этой игре, то всё замечательно))

This game is fun to play, but the fact that others are calling you a cheater, when you basically are an S rank at ESEA, like bruh. I spend more time there, than playing in MM, my rank is low at MM, so as the enemies brain

salas muito competitivas porem o grande problema sao os hackers devido ser um jogo de cinhecimento internacional a valve poderia fazer um anti cheat para poder ter mais comodidade para quem adquiri o jogo fora isso otimo jogo com excelentes servifores
gosto muito do estilo do jogo e tals mas a comunidade é muito tóxica
Joguem essa porra e parem de ser comunistas!
cuando las balas vayan medianamente rectas recomendare este juego a mi abuela
super bon ce jeu vive les pays de l'est
O JOGO É FODA PÁ CARALHO

\то же ахуенный шутер а также стратегия всем советую поиграь это вам не дота) но про реал тоже не забывайте

хотелось бы увидеть новые оружия в кс
Not being p2w is enough for being a good game.
If you have stezm u should have it otherwise u debil

I wish there was a YES/No option cause yes i would recommend this game to others but NO not right now. there are so many little issues that should be easy to fix... like the Direct X issue... every time i do a game file verification it has to be replaced and reinstalled.
SOOOOOOOOOOOOO many hackers... i have been playing for some i dont know 15 years now.. and this is close to the worst i have seen it. There is no negative recourse for hackers... Game is Free ... account is Free... Hack ... get banned eventually... make new account   RINSE AND REPEAT.. meanwhile the true gamer lovers get tired of putting up with it and say screw it im going to play something else.

NEEDS TO BE ADDRESSED... not like this will do much of anything to resolve.

END RANT
not so much fun, much hate in the game
х у й н я     а не игра
warning there b hackers, and you can get wankers cramp after learing how to get awp aces and deagel juan taps
Joguei 350 horas e ainda não sei jogar....¬.¬

This game is extremely fun for strategists and/or any FPS players. There's little to nothing wrong with it, and it actually has a balance of skill setup within it, so people of all levels can play it and still enjoy the game.
Very good game. Many nerds in competitive who think they are good. very fine game but very flustering.
The reason I want to shoot myself yet I still play
